author: wouf
body:
#### PR description:
This is bugfix for cms-sw/cmssw#36316 . It fixes some bugs from [here](https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/jenkins-artifacts/pull-request-integration/PR-cae5ac/22136/llvm-analysis/) 
Also two cff files unused in Configuration/Generator have been deleted in this PR.

#### PR validation:
Hydjet2 - wf 160
Hydjet - wf 150
Pyquen - wf 300
title: bug fixes for Hydjets and Pyquen
